desc.gl:
When using Shield Subverter:
 • Increases BRV based on MAX BRV before BRV attack
 • BRV attack hit count becomes 2; moderately increased cumulative BRV damage
 • Stolen BRV may exceed MAX BRV up to 120%
 • Slight boost to BRV Damage Resist, DEF Up, moderate boost to Elude effects from Mnejing's Tactics
 • Moderate Automaton boost

When using BRV Attack+ (Fine-Tuning):
 • Slight boost to BRV granted to allies
 • Slight boost to BRV Damage Resist, DEF Up, moderate boost to Elude effects from Fine-Tuning
 • Extends active Mnejing's Tactics duration 1 turn
 • Extends allies' active Automaton duration 1 turn

When using HP Attack+ (Optimization):

 • Extends active Ovjang's Tactics duration 1 turn
 • Extends allies' active Automaton duration 1 turn
